title: Elizabeth Polito
text:
I am a first-year Ph.D.Â student in EECS at UC Berkeley. With a background in information theory and signal processing, my current research focuses on theory-driven methods for generative models. I am especially interested in neural data compression, diffusion models, watermarking, and explainable AI.
I obtained my B.S. in Electrical & Computer Engineering from Cornell University in 2025.
Two fun facts about me:

I am a musician! I played for two seasons as principal harpist with Cornell Orchestras and am currently learning piano for fun.
I am a general-class amateur radio operator (callsign: KE2ASU).
